function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Negative impact on real GDP stability","Impact":"Decrease in real GDP stability for affected countries","Mitigation":"Diversification of economy, investment in mobile factors of production","Technologies":"Economic modeling tools, trade analysis software","People":"Citizens, businesses, government","Owner":"Government, international organizations"},{"Description":"Contagious spread of economic instability","Impact":"Spread of economic instability to other countries in the Global Value Chains","Mitigation":"Diversification of trade partners, regional economic integration","Technologies":"Trade analytics platforms, economic forecasting models","People":"Businesses, government agencies, international organizations","Owner":"Government, regional economic alliances"},{"Description":"Reduction in economic activity","Impact":"Decrease in economic activity in selected downstream countries","Mitigation":"Investment in economic stimulus, trade diversification","Technologies":"Economic forecasting software, trade optimization tools","People":"Citizens, businesses, government","Owner":"Government, businesses"}]}
